text: The Acer Predator Helios 300 PH315-51-757A 15.6" 144 Hz IPS GTX 1060 6 GB VRAM i7-8750H 16 GB Memory 256 GB SSD Windows 10 Home Gaming Laptop does what it says on the tin. Good for streaming games, but the trackpad could be better. Had a minor issue with driver updates being a bit tricky, but it was resolved. Solid, but not spectacular.

It's a decent gaming laptop for the money. Performance is good for most games like Elden Ring, but it can struggle a bit with the newest AAA titles on ultra settings with the Acer Predator Helios 300 PH315-51-757A 15.6" 144 Hz IPS GTX 1060 6 GB VRAM i7-8750H 16 GB Memory 256 GB SSD Windows 10 Home Gaming Laptop. The battery life is okay, not great. Overall, it gets the job done.

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1060. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The port selection is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the Acer Predator Helios 300 PH315-51-757A 15.6" 144 Hz IPS GTX 1060 6 GB VRAM i7-8750H 16 GB Memory 256 GB SSD Windows 10 Home Gaming Laptop!

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for content creation and gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1060. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The build material is also top-notch.
